name: Pop (itch) (altered)
description:
Meet Pop, a game where you shoot bubbles with... bubbles

What is there:
- Shoot bubbles as many times as you want, make combos of 3 or more bubbles to pop them, don't make bubbles reach the bottom line!
- Bombs will help you in this cool job, but locks, eyes and timers will disturb you. Watch out not to lose to some timer randomly running out on the bottomest line :)
- Different difficulties: easy, normal, medium and hard. Also there is the Zen mode, which will take off *everything*, even score, so you can just relax.
- A shop full of different stuff! Customize your game experience with some hand-crafted themes (huge shoutout to SVGRepo for some) and make your life easier by getting some upgrades!
- Some achievements to make the game more interesting (some of them are hidden 👀)
